A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a fun intense grad experience. I really liked Rouge One and believed it was better than the The Force Awakens and The Last Jedi in my opinion is the best film since The Empire Strikes Back\, i truly expected a cliff hanger and interestingly I thought the movie was over three times before the end. It was a long epic story with just the right amount of drama\, comedy and story\, excellent!!!
